name: @volkovasystem/get-package-property-list
description: Provide basic and extensible standard convention for npm package property list.

scripts.clean: rm -rfv ./node_modules || true && rm -fv ./package-lock.json || true && npm cache clean --force
scripts.reset: npm run clean && rm -rfv ./get-package-property-list.js || true && rm -rfv ./.build || true && rm -rfv ./.test || true
scripts.bundle: npx parcel build ./*.module.js --no-cache --no-source-maps --no-minify --target node --out-dir ./.build --out-file ./get-package-property-list.js --global getPackagePropertyList && mv ./.build/get-package-property-list.js ./get-package-property-list.js && rm -rfv ./.build || true
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run compress
scripts.stage: npm run reset && npm install && npm run build && npm test && npm run clean

author: Richeve S. Bebedor <richeve.bebedor@gmail.com>
